name: Dell Inspiron 15 Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with Intel Core i5, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and a 15.6-inch Full HD display. Perfect for work and entertainment.

name: Apple MacBook Air M2
description: Ultra-slim and lightweight laptop featuring Apple's M2 chip, 8GB unified memory, and 256GB SSD for fast performance.

name: HP Pavilion Gaming Desktop
description: High-performance gaming desktop with AMD Ryzen 5, NVIDIA GTX 1660, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad 3
description: Budget-friendly laptop with Intel Core i3, 8GB RAM, and 256GB SSD. Great for students and casual users.

name: Asus ROG Strix G15
description: Gaming laptop packed with AMD Ryzen 7, RTX 3060, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD for extreme performance.

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 5
description: Premium design with 13.5-inch PixelSense display, Intel Evo i5 processor, and 512GB SSD.

name: Acer Aspire 5
description: Reliable everyday laptop with AMD Ryzen 5, 8GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Great for office and home use.

name: MSI GF63 Thin Gaming Laptop
description: Lightweight gaming laptop with Intel Core i7, GTX 1650, 16GB RAM, and 512GB NVMe SSD.

name: Apple iMac 24-inch
description: All-in-one desktop with M1 chip, stunning 4.5K Retina display, and elegant slim design.

name: Razer Blade 15
